title: Introduction to Music Theory
description: Learn the fundamentals of music theory, including scales, chords, and basic notation.
name: Dr. Emily Carter
bio: Ph.D. in Music Theory with extensive teaching experience.

title: Guitar for Beginners
description: A complete guide to learning guitar from scratch, including basic chords and strumming patterns.
name: Michael Roberts
bio: Professional guitarist specializing in acoustic and electric guitar.

title: Piano Essentials
description: Master the basics of playing piano, from scales to simple melodies.
name: Sophia Chen
bio: Concert pianist and experienced piano teacher.

title: Advanced Music Composition
description: Dive into advanced techniques for composing and arranging music.
name: John Williams
bio: Award-winning composer for film and orchestral music.

title: Jazz Improvisation
description: Learn the art of jazz improvisation, focusing on scales, modes, and phrasing.
name: David Scott
bio: Professional jazz musician and improvisation coach.

title: Vocal Training and Techniques
description: Develop your voice with professional vocal techniques and exercises.
name: Angela Morgan
bio: Vocal coach with expertise in classical and contemporary singing.

title: Electronic Music Production
description: Create your own tracks using popular DAWs like Ableton Live and FL Studio.
name: Ethan Cooper
bio: Electronic music producer specializing in EDM and hip-hop beats.

title: World Music Exploration
description: Explore musical traditions from around the globe, including African drumming and Indian ragas.
name: Aisha Patel
bio: Ethnomusicologist with a passion for global music traditions.

title: Film Scoring Basics
description: Learn how to compose music for films, focusing on themes, motifs, and orchestration.
name: Lucas Brown
bio: Professional film composer with experience in Hollywood productions.
